decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  external walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the outbuilding without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be used other than for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling house at 114 Vicarage Farm Road and shall not be occupied as primary living accommodation, a separate dwelling or for business purposes.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding to be used of gym / office in the rear garden of the house
